item.title: 2020 Wine and Oil Label Competition at ETSIAAB
item.description: I was a finalist in the 2020 Wine and Oil Label Design Contest of the ETSIAAB, in which I participated with the help of my cousin, Daniel Marcos, who helped me design the wine label, and Marta PÃ©rez, who helped me with the oil label. }
